author: Rachel Kraus
title: 8 non-awkward ways to leave a Zoom hangout
description: You’ve shown off your pets and had some good LOLs, and now the Zoom hang is winding down. But how to actually end it? It’s not like you have anywhere to go. In a virtual hangout, the regular outs of in-person hangs are no longer an option: no waiter is bringi…
content:
Youve shown off your pets and had some good LOLs, and now the Zoom/FaceTime/HouseParty hang is winding down. But how to actually end it? Its not like you have anywhere to go.
In a virtual hangout, the regular outs of in-person hangs aren't an option: no wait… [+7022 chars]
